data.comment: In the minute -5, Laurent Ciman (Toronto) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match has started at Nippert Stadium.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Toronto to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Toronto.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 5, Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
Throw-in Cincinnati.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Toronto's Omar Gonzalez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Robert Sibiga awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Robert Sibiga signals a Toronto throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 10, Cincinnati drive upfield and Haris Medunjanin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Toronto defender.
Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of Toronto.
Omar Gonzalez (Toronto) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, Jonathan Osorio is booked for the away team.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
In the minute 23, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Toronto.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 24, Robert Sibiga awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Robert Sibiga signals a Toronto throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Patrick Mullins.
Great play from Richie Laryea to set up the goal.
In the minute 30, Goal kick for Toronto at Nippert Stadium.
Cincinnati pushes forward through Brandon Vazquez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 37, Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cincinnati.
The match at Nippert Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mathieu Deplagne, who is down injured.
In the minute 41, The home team has substituted Mathieu Deplagne with Andrew Gutman. Jaap Stam is thus making his first change.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Toronto.
At Nippert Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In Cincinnati, Maikel Van der Werff (Cincinnati) misses the target with a header.
Toronto have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Robert Sibiga blows to end the first-half.
Robert Sibiga has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
Greg Vanney is making the team's first substitution at Nippert Stadium with Pablo Piatti replacing Marky Delgado.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Frankie Amaya with Kamohelo Mokotjo.
Jaap Stam (Cincinnati) is making a third substitution, with Siem de Jong replacing Brandon Vazquez.
Free kick Toronto.
Cincinnati are whistled for offside.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 52, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
In the minute 53, Cincinnati to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
Saad Abdul-Salaam of Cincinnati gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Toronto at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Toronto make their second substitution with Ayo Akinola replacing Patrick Mullins.
In the minute 60, Nick DeLeon is on a sub for Jayden Nelson for Toronto.
Robert Sibiga awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Robert Sibiga awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Cincinnati.
Robert Sibiga signals a Toronto throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 64, Allan Cruz is replacing Alvaro Barreal for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Toronto at Nippert Stadium.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Toronto.
In the minute 66, Cincinnati's Andrew Gutman has been booked in Cincinnati.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of Cincinnati.
Nick Hagglund (Cincinnati) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Tony Gallacher is replacing Richie Laryea for the away team.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Cincinnati.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Attention is being given to Cincinnati’s Przemyslaw Tyton and play has been suspended briefly.
Cincinnati's Przemyslaw Tyton looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Przemyslaw Tyton, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Spencer Richey is the substitute for Cincinnati.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Cincinnati in Cincinnati.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 86, Robert Sibiga awards Toronto a goal kick.
Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Laurent Ciman is replacing Alejandro Pozuelo for the away team.
Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Cincinnati's Joseph-Claude Gyau gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Toronto defender.
Robert Sibiga will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Toronto at Nippert Stadium.
Throw-in Toronto.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Cincinnati surge into the attack at Nippert Stadium but Nick Hagglund’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
